channel.title: Help
channel.description:
Well i added a portal in my Pk-Box to go to home.
I was just wondering is there a way the character would have to wait to tele back.
Like they would have to wait 5-10 seconds.
My other question is how would i get an Npc to attack a player when they tele nearby it.
I am using Delta as my Base.
If you could just answer one question im fine with it but im stumped here.
Thank's- [b]Peepzi.[/b]

item.title: Help
